summary: After falling through a time-slip, Yusei Fudo (who has just had his powerful card stolen by a mysterious stranger) meets with Judai Yuki and Yugi Muto, who agree to help Yusei defeat the ... See full summary »

title: Gekijouban Yuugiou: Chouyuugou! Jikuu o koeta kizuna
